title: i am unable to read Taliya's story
body: it starts to load and ends in a black screen with only the shuriman bar going across the screen. IDK if it's a bug or not released yet or supposed to do that but fig I'd let y'all know. I attached an image as proof.

replies.body:
Hmm...to be honest, I haven't seen this issue ever pop up before.  Have you attempted loading the story in a completely different web browser than what you normally use?  Such as using Internet Explorer instead of Chrome/Firefox?

Let me know if this helps at all!

i had the same problem. Windows 7 running chrome, italian and english pages didn't work (had to change the url manually), read the german version

rammus page works just fine
^this. finally had gotten it to work. was an odd thing. good story once i could read it though.
